issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: As a cloudformation user, I would like to support AWS::CloudFormation::WaitCondition and AWS::CloudFormation::WaitConditionHandle to update stack.  AWS does not "support" these resources, but I would like to at least indicate that they are not supported as AWS does.
fields.summary: CF: CloudFormationWaitCondition[Handle] non-support for Update Stack

comments.body:
*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25084.394.20160830git660153b.el7}}

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus VPC cloud
# Upload, bundle and install Ubuntu Cloud image
# Create non-eucalyptus account
# Deploy stack using linked {{cfn-helper-scripts-waitcondition.json}} template:
{code}
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euform-create-stack NginxWaitConditionTest --template-file cfn-helper-scripts-waitcondition.json --parameter ImageId=emi-d978f0ca --parameter KeyName=sales-admin --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.b-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region sales-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::002598321247:stack/NginxWaitConditionTest/94c10e6d-a4dc-40f9-8089-690d2a5d8e77

[root@g-22-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region sales-admin@
STACK	NginxWaitConditionTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		Cloudformation WaitCondition Handle Example => Run instance with userdata to install Nginx Web Server in security group on VPC	2016-09-15T19:29:18.218Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-d978f0ca
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.b-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	KeyName		sales-admin
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-08336188
OUTPUT	AZ	ds2
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.116.155.131
[root@g-22-04 ~]# curl -I 10.116.155.131
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Thu, 15 Sep 2016 19:32:22 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 612
Last-Modified: Thu, 15 Sep 2016 19:31:08 GMT
Connection: keep-alive
ETag: "57daf6fc-264"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
{code}
# Run UpdateStack using linked {{cfn-helper-scripts-waitcondition-update.json}} template on deployed stack. Confirm stack completes with {{UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE}} state:
{code}
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euform-update-stack NginxWaitConditionTest --template-file cfn-helper-scripts-waitcondition-update.json --parameter ImageId=emi-d978f0ca --parameter KeyName=sales-admin --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.b-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region sales-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::002598321247:stack/NginxWaitConditionTest/94c10e6d-a4dc-40f9-8089-690d2a5d8e77

[root@g-22-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region sales-admin@
STACK	NginxWaitConditionTest	UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE		Cloudformation WaitCondition Handle Example => Run instance with userdata to install Nginx Web Server in security group on VPC	2016-09-15T19:29:18.218Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-d978f0ca
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.b-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	KeyName		sales-admin
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-08336188
OUTPUT	AZ	ds2
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.116.155.131
{code}
# Review stack events to confirm {{AWS::CloudFormation::WaitCondition}} resource has the appropriate message stating updates aren't supported:
{code}
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euform-describe-stack-events NginxWaitConditionTest --region sales-admin@
